Texts.Eng: An ^orange;Incubator^reset; might be a worthwhile idea if you want to hatch eggs! With it, you can toss in an egg and quickly generate a baby animal. Well, quicker than letting nature handle it, anyhow. Make one at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset;.
Try incubating different eggs, and see what sort of wonderful animals you can bring to life!
